channel.title: Neutral Killer - The Depender
channel.description:
[quote] (Female :D) <big>**[color=B8B6B6]The Depender[/color]**</big> [color=B8B6B6]**Neutral Killer**[/color]
**Royal Rival (Passive)** - Triple the vote to you during King Select. Appear to be Occupy and Redirect immune to Offensive Classes.
**I accidentally killed your friend (Passive)** - Her first kill faction with **Backstab** will choose which faction will she along with. Also death immune and bleed immune!
- **[color=2A7AFC]Blue Dragon[/color]** - She will lose bleed immune and death immune. - **[color=EE1212]Cult[/color]** - Fill up a Convert slot and [color=B8B6B6]**Depender**[/color] will know other **[color=EE1212]Cult[/color]**'s but unable to talk with them. - **[color=8012D6]Unseen[/color]** - Join the **[color=8012D6]Unseen[/color]** and filling the **[color=8012D6]Assassin[/color]** slot. Death immune will only work once. The **[color=8012D6]Assassin[/color]** will die in the place of the **[color=8012D6]Converted Unseen[/color]**. - **[color=B8B6B6]Neutral[/color]** - She will play as normal **[color=B8B6B6]Neutral Killer[/color]**
**Flirty (Day)** - Occupy the target tonight. [4 Use]
**Daughter Revenge (Day)** - Poison the King and they will die that night unless healed. [1 Use]
**Backstab (Night)** - Kill your target. Reduce to 2 Use as choosing **[color=2A7AFC]Blue Dragon[/color]** or **[color=EE1212]Cult[/color]**. [Unlimited Use]
**An End to a Start (Night)** - Heal a target while killing everyone visiting them. Have 0 Use if choose **[color=EE1212]Cult[/color]**. [1 Use]
**Win condition:** *You have the same win condition as the faction you chose. You will have **[color=B8B6B6]Neutral Killer[/color]** win condition if you didnt kill that round.* [/quote]
If she become King, she will become Psycho King. **Fatal Guard** will be disabled if she did not choose **[color=B8B6B6]Neutral[/color]** .

item.description:

Choosing Faction - NK speciality, each have them

It isn’t really an NK if they can kill a CW and then become another BD.

item.description:
Choosing Faction - NK speciality, each have them
Triple the vote but not as powerful as normal Psychk King
Reducing Kill abilies as choosing BD and Cult because BD is not built to killing at night constantly, and Cult already have CL

item.title: Neutral Killer - The Depender
item.dc:creator: thepigeonnyc
item.description:
SweetyCake:

I accidentally killed your friend (Passive) - Her first kill faction with Backstab will choose which faction will she along with

Super swingy, should not be on a NK.

SweetyCake:

Royal Rival (Passive) - Triple the vote to you during King Select. Appear to be Occupy and Redirect immune to Offensive Classes.

Triple vote for king is just odd. Fake occ immunity is actually a bad thing,

SweetyCake:

Cult - Fill up a Convert slot and Depender will know other Cult ’s but unable to talk with them.

Why keep DI?

SweetyCake:

Reduce to 2 Use as choosing Blue Dragon or Cult

Why reduce when cult?

SweetyCake:

Have 0 Use if choose Cult

Why?

Read full topic

item.title: Neutral Killer - The Depender
item.dc:creator: SweetyCake
item.description:
(Female :D)
The Depender
Neutral Killer

Royal Rival (Passive) - Triple the vote to you during King Select. Appear to be Occupy and Redirect immune to Offensive Classes.

I accidentally killed your friend (Passive) - Her first kill faction with Backstab will choose which faction will she along with. Also death immune and bleed immune!

  • Blue Dragon - She will lose bleed immune and death immune.
  • Cult - Fill up a Convert slot and Depender will know other Cult’s but unable to talk with them.
  • Unseen - Join the Unseen and filling the Assassin slot. Death immune will only work once. The Assassin will die in the place of the Converted Unseen.
  • Neutral - She will play as normal Neutral Killer

Flirty (Day) - Occupy the target tonight. [4 Use]

Daughter Revenge (Day) - Poison the King and they will die that night unless healed. [1 Use]

Backstab (Night) - Kill your target. Reduce to 2 Use as choosing Blue Dragon or Cult. [Unlimited Use]

An End to a Start (Night) - Heal a target while killing everyone visiting them. Have 0 Use if choose Cult. [1 Use]

Win condition:
You have the same win condition as the faction you chose. You will have Neutral Killer win condition if you didnt kill that round.

If she become King, she will become Psycho King. Fatal Guard will be disabled if she did not choose Neutral .

Read full topic
